text: neohuineun abeulahamgwa iseuma elgwa isaggwa yagobgwa geuui husondeul i yudaein heug-eun gidoggyoindeul-ila malhaneunyo illeogalodoe neohoedeul-i ha nanimboda deo jal aneunyo hananim-eu lobuteo gyesi bad-eun jeung-eon-eul sumgineun jaboda deo saaghan jaga nugu-inyo hananimkkeseoneun neohoega haneun il-eul moleuneun bun-i anisila
